response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I understand its significance and would like to offer you an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special price. My proposal is to extend this extraordinary product to you for $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive a remarkable value while allowing me to maximize the product's worth. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
